title: New: Des Roses – The Bond
body:
From Nantes, France comes [**Des Roses**](http://facebook.

com/desrosesband), a three piece collective that sounds determined to spread thrills and shivers with **The Bond**. Drawing inspiration from the melancholic dream pop of the ’80s, [**Des Roses**](http://facebook.com/desrosesband) give a **Woman’s Hour**\-esque appeal that could easily be one of the highlights from the London’s quartet debut album. All in all, a strong debut that deserves repetitive listens. Check out The Bond below.
